title: The Honest Company 2-in-1 Cleansing Shampoo + Body Wash | Gentle for Baby | Naturally Derived, Tear-free, Hypoallergenic | Lavender Calm, 10 fl oz
description: From self-care to baby’s bathtime, this tear-free shampoo + body wash has a calming lavender scent that’s perfect for a relaxing wind-down routine. Made with chamomile extract, aloe and other naturally derived ingredients, this 2-in-1 formula cleanses from head to toe. Gentle enough for babies, but great for the whole fam.
